meanings.sent1: The ocean waves looked foamier as the storm approached.
meanings.sent2: Her cappuccino was foamier than usual this morning.
meanings.sent3: The foamier clouds reminded me of a fluffy blanket in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The foamier appearance of the soap bubbles made them look like tiny clouds.
meanings.sent5: The foamier texture of the milk made the latte extra delicious.

meanings.sent1: The foamier detergent created more bubbles in the sink.
meanings.sent2: The foamier soap was perfect for washing the car.
meanings.sent3: The foamier shampoo made her hair look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The foamier bath bomb fizzed and bubbled in the warm water.
meanings.sent5: The foamier shaving cream made his morning routine more enjoyable.
